launchservicesd(8) System Manager's Manual launchservicesd(8)

NAME

launchservicesd

SYNOPSIS

launchservicesd [--server]

DESCRIPTION

launchservicesd is used internally by MacOS X to track and coordinate information about the running applications on the system.

FILES

/System/Library/CoreServices/launchservicesd
 

SEE ALSO

lsappinfo(8)

HISTORY

launchservicesd was introduced in MacOS 10.9.
04/01/13 Darwin
